title: PINKEYE
role: A Russian cosmonaut floats around inside the cockpit.

title: PINKEYE
text: Vlad nyet chakesfski. Bordat comrade daboolschnet.

title: PINKEYE
role: SUBTITLES: "Propulsion systems stable. No problems with MIR."

title: PINKEYE
role: Suddenly, a green-faced monster with 6 eyes pops out from
text: behind the control panel.

title: PINKEYE
text: Graah!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Aieeee!

title: PINKEYE
role: The monster removes its mask, revealing it is actually
text: Cosmonaut #2.

title: PINKEYE
text: Porchat! Vlidit shtadecht!

title: PINKEYE
text: Shtadt bodit but shtad!

title: PINKEYE
role: SUBTITLES: "You scared me you communist bastard!"

title: PINKEYE
role: A red light on the control panel starts to flash. Yet another
text: cosmonaut floats into frame.

title: PINKEYE
text: Uh... Shtool.

title: PINKEYE
text: Schtool.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys stand at the busstop.

title: PINKEYE
role: They say nothing, just stare forward and blink.

title: PINKEYE
role: SMACK!! The MIR Space Station drops from the sky and crushes
text: Kenny, killing him instantly.

title: PINKEYE
text: OH MY GOD! They killed Kenny!

title: PINKEYE
text: You bastards!!

title: PINKEYE
text: What the hell is that thing?

title: PINKEYE
text: It looks like a UFO!

title: PINKEYE
text: There's no such thing as UFOs!

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then an ambulance pulls up. Two paramedics get out.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys watch as the paramedics place Kenny's crushed body
text: into a plastic body bag.

title: PINKEYE
text: Let's get him to the Morgue.

title: PINKEYE
role: They throw Kenny's body in the back, jump in the car and
text: drive away. The boys stand there for several seconds, blinking. Then the school bus pulls up and they shuffle on.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey, wait 'till you guys see my Halloween costume tomorrow! It kicks ass!

title: PINKEYE
text: Dude, it can't be cooler than mine!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey, man, we gotta get home and get our costumes ready!

title: PINKEYE
role: Clouds pass in front of the moon behind a creepy building
text: ominously nestled between two large hills and surrounded by a huge graveyard.

title: PINKEYE
role: A large black bird swoops down and perches on a large sign
text: which reads: "SOUTH PARK Mortuary". The bird lets out a shrill cry. Then it lets out a poop.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny's dead body lies on an embalming table, surrounded by
text: tubes and medical instruments. The MORTICIAN and his ASSISTANT stand nearby. On the wall behind them is a calendar which is marked off up till the day "OCTOBER 30".

title: PINKEYE
role: The Assistant sets the bottle down on a nearby shelf. The
text: Mortician takes an IV needle and sticks it into Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Sighing) You know... I think death is least funny when it happens to a child.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh Yeah, I know what you mean.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Assistant pours some Worchestershire sauce onto a corn
text: dog and takes a bite.

title: PINKEYE
text: Marty, do you have to put that stuff on everything?

title: PINKEYE
text: I don't know. It just makes everything taste so... English!

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, let's let him drain.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortician and his Assistant leave the room. The syringe
text: drains Kenny's blood into a bucket.

title: PINKEYE
role: CREEPY MUSIC starts up as we see another tube which runs
text: embalming fluid into Kenny. We FOLLOW the tube up to a shelf, past a row of bottles, up to a vat labeled "EMBALMING FLUID".

title: PINKEYE
role: We MOVE UP to see that on the shelf above the vat sits the
text: bottle of Worchestershire sauce. As the music gets LOUDER, the bottle starts to rock back and forth.

title: PINKEYE
role: Suddenly, it FALLS over and begins to pour out into the vat
text: of embalming fluid!

title: PINKEYE
role: As the music reaches a CRESCENDO, Kenny's eyes pop open!

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortician and his Assistant stand by the back door,
text: smoking cigarettes.

title: PINKEYE
text: So then the necrophiliac says, if this ain't a cadaver, then I...

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny leaps onto the Mortician and clamps onto his head like
text: a velociraptor. A short melee ensues as Kenny claws and bites both men and runs away.

title: PINKEYE
text: (holding his head) God damn, that little turd bit me!

title: PINKEYE
text: (clutching his arm) Me too!

title: PINKEYE
role: As CREEPY MUSIC plays, Kenny's zombie silhouette walks down
text: South Park avenue -- clouds drift in front of a bright, half moon.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle stands alone at the busstop, but we don't recognize
text: him. He is wearing a strange, furry mask.

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan walks up dressed as Raggedy Andy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Ha ha! You look like a pansy!

title: PINKEYE
text: Shut up, Kyle!

title: PINKEYE
text: What are you supposed to be?

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm Raggedy Andy.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Laughing) Why the hell did you dress up like Raggedy Andy, dude?!

title: PINKEYE
text: Wendy's going as Raggedy Anne. And she said this way we'd win the costume contest for sure.

title: PINKEYE
text: No way, dude. I'm gonna win the costume contest with this sweet Chewbacca costume!

title: PINKEYE
text: Wendy said that first prize is two tons of candy!

title: PINKEYE
text: Wow, Cool!

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then Cartman walks up dressed as Hitler.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey dudes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Cartman... What kind of costume is that?

title: PINKEYE
text: It's Adolph Hitler costume. SIEG HIEL!! SIEG HIEL!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Where'd you get that?

title: PINKEYE
text: My mom made it. Isn't it Cool?

title: PINKEYE
text: NO IT'S NOT COOL!

title: PINKEYE
text: What are you supposed to be, Stan? Howdy Doody?

title: PINKEYE
text: No, I'm Raggedy Andy, fat ass!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh. Wow, you look pretty cool.

title: PINKEYE
role: Long pause... Then Cartman and Kyle laugh loudly.

title: PINKEYE
text: Sissy

title: PINKEYE
text: I'll kick your ass, Kyle!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh look out! Holly Hobby is all pissed off!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny walks up. One of his ribs juts out. Dark circles ring
text: his eyes. He looks like a Zombie.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey look, Kenny's not dead.

title: PINKEYE
text: You forgot to wear a costume Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yea, what's the matter? Couldn't your family afford a costume for you?

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah, why is your family so poor, Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: Kenny's family is so poor, that yesterday they had to put their cardboard box up for a second mortgage.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys laugh and wait for a smart ass comeback from Kenny,
text: but Kenny just stands there.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Agitated) I said your family had to put a cardboard box up for a second mortgage!! Kenny!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm talking to you, Kenny! Achtung!! Poor piece of crap.

title: PINKEYE
text: Come on, we're running late!

title: PINKEYE
text: Ah, we're ALWAYS running late you ugly skank.

title: PINKEYE
text: WHAT DID YOU SAY?

title: PINKEYE
text: I said I can't wait to own a fishing tank.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh... neither can I.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortician and his Assistant sit on a little hospital
text: bed. The DOCTOR uses his stethoscope on their chests. The Assistant moans softly.

title: PINKEYE
text: Very interesting...

title: PINKEYE
text: What is it Doc?

title: PINKEYE
role: The Doctor takes the stethoscope out of his ears.

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, your temperature is only 55 degrees, you have no pulse, no heartbeat, and your eyes are all puffy and sticky.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, no. You mean...

title: PINKEYE
text: Yea, I'm afraid the two of you have pink eye.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortician and his Assistant gasp.

title: PINKEYE
text: I'd give you topical medicine but I don't want to touch you.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh I'm so hungry and all I can think about eating is is... BRAINS!

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah, well, for God's sake don't touch your eyes. I'll prescribe some antibiotics.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys walk into the classroom.

title: PINKEYE
text: Just wait till everyone sees my sweet Chewbacca costume! They're gonna be so jealous --

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys walk in and see:

title: PINKEYE
role: The entire class is dressed up like Chewbacca.

title: PINKEYE
text: Whoa dude!

title: PINKEYE
text: (Incredulous) EVERYONE came as Chewbacca?

title: PINKEYE
text: It sure does seem to be a popular costume this year Kyle.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys turn to see MR. GARRISON dressed up like MARILYN
text: MONROE. He lifts up his hands to reveal MR. HAT, who is dressed as Chewbacca.

title: PINKEYE
text: (WOOKIE GROWL)

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle removes his mask and throws it down.

title: PINKEYE
text: Dammit!

title: PINKEYE
text: Wendy?

title: PINKEYE
role: The Chewbacca next to Stan takes off it's mask to reveal
text: that it's WENDY.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hi Stan.

title: PINKEYE
text: You said we were going to be Raggedy Anne and Andy, remember?

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah.

title: PINKEYE
text: We were going to enter the costume contest as a pair!

title: PINKEYE
text: I know, but then... I guess I just realized how stupid we would look.

title: PINKEYE
text: You WHAT?!!

title: PINKEYE
text: I thought you would reach the same conclusion, so I came as Chewbacca.

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan slams his head down on his desk.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Stan, you look almost pretty enough to kiss.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah, you want to be my girlfrind?

title: PINKEYE
text: You see? All of a sudden my costume is pretty bad ass, huh?

title: PINKEYE
text: Dude, dressing up like Hitler is NOT bad ass!

title: PINKEYE
text: You're just jealous. Why don't you go back to Endor, you stupid Wookie!

title: PINKEYE
text: Wookies don't live on Endor!

title: PINKEYE
text: (Mimicing him) Mama ma mi mo momo!

title: PINKEYE
text: At least my mom's not on the cover of Crack Whore Magazine!

title: PINKEYE
text: What? What did you say?!

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay now, all you little Chewbaccas take your seats.

title: PINKEYE
text: Children, since today is Halloween, I thought we should learn something about the great horror writer Jackie Collins. You see, when Jackie Collins first wrote her novel..

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny's arm falls off and hits the floor.

title: PINKEYE
text: Ew!

title: PINKEYE
text: Is there a problem Kenny? Let's try to keep our hands and arms to ourselves, okay?

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm never going to win that 2 tons of candy looking like everyone else!

title: PINKEYE
role: Ms. Cartman decorates the exterior of the house with Halloween
text: paraphernalia. It is already covered with plastic pumpkins, skeletons, witches, vampires, graphic scenes from car crashes and photos of mutilated bodies.

title: PINKEYE
role: She hums happily as she hangs a photo of President Nixon.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, I'm gonna decorate the house for Halloween, With scary ghosts and bats and creepy crawly things.

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then the Mortician and his Assistant walk by, looking
text: completely Zombified.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hello there! Happy Halloween!

title: PINKEYE
text: Must... eat... brains... brains...

title: PINKEYE
role: Another Townsperson walks past them and bumps into the
text: Mortician.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortician and his Assistant immediately rip into the
text: Townsperson and gnaw on his head. The Townsperson SCREAMS like a banshee.

title: PINKEYE
role: Ms. Cartman continues to decorate, singing to herself happily.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Singing) It's the most wonderful time of the year...

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm gonna make a new costume during recess. I can STILL win that candy!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Kenny, are you gonna eat your pudding?

title: PINKEYE
text: (in a different voice) No, Eric, go ahead and take my pudding if you like. (normal voice) Why thank you, Kenny, how nice of you!

title: PINKEYE
text: Aren't you hungry Kenny?

title: PINKEYE
text: He hasn't moved an inch or said anything.

title: PINKEYE
role: CHEF approaches wearing a red white and blue jumpsuit.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hello children!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Chef.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef stops when he sees Cartman's costume.

title: PINKEYE
text: What in the hell are you doing dressed up like that?

title: PINKEYE
text: (mouth full) Eating Kenny's pudding.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hello there, children. Oh, love the Elvis costume, Chef.

title: PINKEYE
text: Elvis? I'm Evil Knieval! Why the hell would I dress up like Elvis?

title: PINKEYE
text: Why the hell would you dress up like Evil Knieval? Anyway, I hope that you kids are --

title: PINKEYE
role: She stops when she sees Cartman's costume.

title: PINKEYE
text: AAAGH!! Eric! God bless it. What do you think you're doing?

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey, he SAID I could have his pudding! Ask him yourself!

title: PINKEYE
text: (in a different voice) That's right Principal Victoria, it's okay with me 'cause Eric is cool.

title: PINKEYE
text: Where did you get that costume young man?

title: PINKEYE
text: My mom made it. (loudly) SEIG HIEL!! SEIG HIEL!!

title: PINKEYE
text: SHUSH!! (Panicking) Oh, God bless America. You get into my office before anyone else sees you! I have to show you an educational video!

title: PINKEYE
role: She drags Cartman away from the table. He squeals like a
text: hungry pig.

title: PINKEYE
text: Squueeee!! I don't want to see an educational video.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny leans over and bites into Clyde's arm -- CHOMP!

title: PINKEYE
text: OWWW! You bit my arm.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh Good! Kenny's back to normal!

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman sits in a tiny chair opposite the Principal's desk,
text: watching a video monitor.

title: PINKEYE
text: Watch the video Eric.

title: PINKEYE
text: Adolf Hitler was a very, very naughty man.

title: PINKEYE
role: The image on the TV becomes one of those famous shots from
text: WW2 footage of Hitler addressing a mass of Nazis.

title: PINKEYE
text: Sfinen! Loobin der Bruce Leeben! Ala mencian verden brooder! Tauchter aus elisium! Ala mention vereden brooder vaus de modem stragal tout!

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman's smile grows. He seems impressed and intrigued.

title: PINKEYE
role: He looks closely at the screen, but now the image of Hitler
text: has been replaced by Cartman on the stage.

title: PINKEYE
text: Juden est forbideen! Est una scrava uts cafiga hoda!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Juden est forbideen! goddamit!

title: PINKEYE
role: Now a little Smokey Bear type creature steps in front of the
text: camera.

title: PINKEYE
text: So remember kids, dressing up like Hitler in school isn't cool.

title: PINKEYE
role: These words appear across the screen as Smokey Bear says
text: them. Principal Victoria shuts the TV off.

title: PINKEYE
text: Now, do you have any questions?

title: PINKEYE
text: Can I see that again? That was cool!

title: PINKEYE
text: You must remove that costume immediately!

title: PINKEYE
text: I can't, I have to win those two tons of candy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Well how about we make you a new costume? Let's see now...

title: PINKEYE
role: She looks around the office and spots a white sheet on a
text: shelf.

title: PINKEYE
text: Aha! Though of something. How about we make you a nice scary ghost costume?

title: PINKEYE
text: (whiny) I don't wanna be a stupid scary ghost!

title: PINKEYE
role: ANGLE ON: Principal Victoria, as she throws the sheet over
text: Cartman and starts SNIPPING away with a pair of scissors.

title: PINKEYE
text: (as she works) And lemme just make a few quickie alterations and... there you go young man!

title: PINKEYE
role: FULL SHOT OF CARTMAN, WHO NOW LOOKS LIKE A LITTLE KLANSMAN
text: IN HIS WHITE ROBE AND HOOD.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mortican Zombie and his Assistant Zombie-walk down the
text: street.

title: PINKEYE
role: They come across a pair of Joggers.

title: PINKEYE
text: Ooh, looks like they got a touch of that pink eye that's going around...

title: PINKEYE
role: The Zombies attack the joggers. The Joggers SCREAM
text: horrifically.

title: PINKEYE
role: The gym is decorated for Halloween. A large banner reads
text: 'Costume Contest!'.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Chewbacca children all stand in line. At the end are KKK
text: Cartman, Stan (still as Raggedy Andy) and Zombie Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: Boo! I'm a ghost!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh man, I feel like a total chode.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh c'mon Stan. Maybe that's just because you LOOK like a total chode.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hello, children.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Chef.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef turns around and JUMPS when he sees Cartman.

title: PINKEYE
text: AHH!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Whoa, Chef's really scared of ghosts huh!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey, where's Kyle?

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then, the gym doors fly open and Kyle walks in wearing
text: a HUGE solar system costume.

title: PINKEYE
text: Check THIS out!

title: PINKEYE
text: Whoa, dude!

title: PINKEYE
text: What is that?

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm the whole solar system!! The planets even all revolve the right way! That tub of candy is as good as mine!

title: PINKEYE
role: Mr. Garrison tweets on a little whistle.

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay children, let's get you lined up so the judge can get a good look at your stupid little costumes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Children, this year we have a celebrity judge. The star of 'Family Ties'... Miss Tina Yothers!

title: PINKEYE
role: Tina Yothers prances out on stage. The kids are unimpressed.

title: PINKEYE
text: Who?

title: PINKEYE
text: Dude, I thought she was dead.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yea, me too.

title: PINKEYE
role: Tina Yothers approaches Mr. Garrison and hands him an
text: envelope.

title: PINKEYE
text: Thank you, Miss Yothers.

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay, The Second Place award for best costume goes to... Kenny, for his Edward James Olmos costume!

title: PINKEYE
role: Tina Yothers pins a red ribbon on Kenny. He drools.

title: PINKEYE
text: And the award for the Very Best Costume goes to....

title: PINKEYE
text: WENDY! For her Chewbacca costume!

title: PINKEYE
role: Wendy walks past all the other identical Chewbaccas and
text: receives the blue ribbon.

title: PINKEYE
text: WHAT?! But she looks just like everybody else!

title: PINKEYE
role: Wendy receives her two tons of candy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Up yours Tina Yothers!!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: And the award for the WORST costume this year goes to... STAN for his stupid little clown thing costume.

title: PINKEYE
role: Let's all point at Stan and laugh children.

title: PINKEYE
role: Everybody points and laughs at Stan.

title: PINKEYE
text: (muttering) Thanks a lot, Wendy. You RUINED my Halloween!

title: PINKEYE
text: Relax Stan, You'll feel better once we're out trick or treating.

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan can't believe it. He looks bitch-slapped.

title: PINKEYE
text: I don't want to trick or treat with you! You lied to me!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay, children let's all gather around and bob for stupid apples now.

title: PINKEYE
role: The kids gather around a large barrel of water.

title: PINKEYE
text: You go first bebe...

title: PINKEYE
role: Bebe steps up and dunks her head in the water.

title: PINKEYE
text: That's good, just use those mouth muscles like the girls in Beijing.

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then, a little zombie Clyde steps up next to zombie
text: Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: Brains...

title: PINKEYE
role: Clyde dunks his head in after Bebe's head. Bebe screams in
text: pain.

title: PINKEYE
text: Wait your turn, Clyde!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef walk up to his house with a bag of groceries under his
text: arm. He pulls out his keys, when suddenly --

title: PINKEYE
role: BAM!! A townsperson, JOHNSON, throws himself against the
text: door. He is a Zombie.

title: PINKEYE
text: ARRGGHH!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: AGH!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Damn, Johnson, what the hell's gotten into you?

title: PINKEYE
text: Piiinnnkkk... eyyeee...

title: PINKEYE
role: Johnson lunges at Chef. Chef dodges and unlocks the front
text: door.

title: PINKEYE
text: Get the hell out of here, Johnson! I don't want no God damn pink eye!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef goes inside and slams the door shut.

title: PINKEYE
role: INT. CHEF'S HOUSE - A LITTLE LATER

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef sits in front of the TV, squeezing one of those
text: handmuscle things.

title: PINKEYE
text: ...and the President responded to the incident by saying, quote, "Screw those commie bastards, and screw their little wussy space station".

title: PINKEYE
role: The Anchorman turns to another camera.

title: PINKEYE
text: In other news, a pink eye epidemic is now sweeping the town of South Park. Here with a live report is a midget wearing a bikini.

title: PINKEYE
role: A midget wearing a bikini stands in front of South Park
text: avenue.

title: PINKEYE
text: Thanks, Tom. Already more than half of the townspeople here in South Park have been infected with the pink eye virus.

title: PINKEYE
role: Footage of townspeople walking around lik Zombies, arms
text: outstretched, attacking people and eating their brains.

title: PINKEYE
text: Symptoms include a complete loss of heart functions, blood pressure, lung activity, and of course, sticky, puffy eyes.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef puts down the remote control.

title: PINKEYE
text: Pink eye my ass! I've seen this kind of thing before...

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan and Cartman stand on the sidewalk, ready to trick or
text: treat.

title: PINKEYE
text: Where the hell is Kyle? We don't have all night to wait for him!

title: PINKEYE
text: I bet I get more candy than you, dude.

title: PINKEYE
text: Are you crazy? I'm the Candy Master!

title: PINKEYE
text: No no, you're the ASS Master. There's a difference.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey, I'm not the one who walked around all day looking like Pippi Longstockings!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh yeah?! Well, at least MY mom's not on the cover of Crack Whore Magazine!!

title: PINKEYE
text: God Dammit! My mom is NOT on the cover of Crack whore magazine!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle walks in dressed as a little vampire.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey dudes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh good you're here. Now, let's make sure we've got everything. Flashlight?

title: PINKEYE
text: Check.

title: PINKEYE
text: Plastic pumpkin pails?

title: PINKEYE
text: Check.

title: PINKEYE
text: Tazer?

title: PINKEYE
text: What's that?

title: PINKEYE
text: For shocking people who try to give us granola treats or something.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah, granola pisses me off!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Kenny.

title: PINKEYE
text: Whew! You stink, Kenny!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys consider him for a moment.

title: PINKEYE
text: You STILL didn't get a costume, Kenny?

title: PINKEYE
text: Too bad drinking scotch isn't a paying job or else Kenny's dad would be a millionaire!

title: PINKEYE
text: I said YOUR DAD WOULD BE A MILLIONAIRE!! KENNY!!! Kenny your family is poor!! Kenny your family's poor!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: (To Stan) I don't like Kenny anymore. He just doesn't communicate.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys start to walk away. Just then, Wendy shows up.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hi guys.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hi Wendy.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Sarcastic) How's your barrel full of candy, Wendy?

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, I didn't want all that sweet stuff. I gave it away to hungry children in Narobi.

title: PINKEYE
text: YOU WHAT?! ARE YOU INSANE?!

title: PINKEYE
text: Let's go trick or treats!

title: PINKEYE
text: I don't think so, Wendy. I think you've had enough candy for one day!

title: PINKEYE
text: Stan, I'm awful sorry you got dressed up like Raggedy Andy. Please don't be mad.

title: PINKEYE
text: How can he be mad with such pretty hair and rosy cheeks?

title: PINKEYE
text: Trick or treat with yourself, Wendy!

title: PINKEYE
text: But Stan.

title: PINKEYE
text: No buts Wendy, I wish you were dead!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys walk away. Wendy looks sad. She stands there alone,
text: when suddenly a shadow looms over her. Wendy turns around and screams.

title: PINKEYE
text: AAAGGHHH!!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef rushes into the office, where the Doctor is examining a
text: patient.

title: PINKEYE
text: Doctor!

title: PINKEYE
text: Why hello Chef. Let me guess -- pink eye, right?

title: PINKEYE
text: No, Doctor! I've seen this type of thing before...

title: PINKEYE
text: This ain't no pink eye... It's THE LIVING DEAD!

title: PINKEYE
text: What the hell are you talking about?

title: PINKEYE
text: Think about it! Dead people getting up and walking around... and Tina Yothers comes to town! Coincidence? Oh I don't think so!

title: PINKEYE
text: Chef, I think maybe the pink eye has made you a little delirious. Let me give you some topical cream --

title: PINKEYE
text: Damnit! Don't you see? These people have been Zombified! They got no heartbeat, no feeling... I'll show you.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef goes over to the patient and rips off his arm. Blood
text: spews everywhere as the patient SCREAMS in agony.

title: PINKEYE
text: Uh Mr. Torres was here for a routine checkup, Chef.

title: PINKEYE
role: Mr. Torres collapses to the ground.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh. Sorry. But my point is that topical cream ain't gonna fix what's wrong here!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey... Hey now, there have been a lot of incredible advances in topical creams over the last few years!

title: PINKEYE
role: The patient passes out from loss of blood.

title: PINKEYE
text: Doctor, who was the first person to come in here with the sickness?

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, it was the Mortician and his assistant at the Morgue yea.

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then four Zombies burst into the office!!

title: PINKEYE
text: AAGHHH!!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef jumps out the window and escapes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Now now, fellas, let's form a line. I've got enough topical cream for everybody!

title: PINKEYE
role: The Zombies attack the doctor, who SCREAMS out in pain.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys stand on the front porch. The door opens revealing
text: an older lady.

title: PINKEYE
text: Trick or Treat!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, how cute!

title: PINKEYE
role: The lady takes a handful of candy and starts to put it in
text: Cartman's bag --

title: PINKEYE
role: Suddenly, Kenny lashes out and bites the woman's arm almost
text: in half.

title: PINKEYE
text: AAIIIEEE!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Dude, Kenny!

title: PINKEYE
text: OH MY GOD!

title: PINKEYE
role: She slams the door shut. From inside we hear hear muffled
text: screams.

title: PINKEYE
text: CALL 911! CALL 911!! CALL 911! CALL 911!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh nice going, Kenny! She was about to give us the candy!

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah! She had Sweetie Pops!

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman slaps him in the head.

title: PINKEYE
text: You owe me a Sweetie Pop, asshole!

title: PINKEYE
text: Mayor, we've got a BIG problem --

title: PINKEYE
role: Barbrady stands in front of the desk in women's underwear.
text: The Mayor pops up from behind her desk.

title: PINKEYE
text: Why... Why Chef, what a surprise!

title: PINKEYE
text: You're probably wondering why we're standing here with a pile of money and no pants on.

title: PINKEYE
text: Actually, I...

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, I can assure you that it has ABSOLUTELY NOTHING to do with the Japanese Mafia

title: PINKEYE
text: Not a thingy dingy.

title: PINKEYE
text: I don't really give a crap. We've got to do something about THE LIVING DEAD!

title: PINKEYE
text: You mean Tina Yothers?

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mayor and Officer Barbrady LAUGH hysterically.

title: PINKEYE
text: No, dammit! I'm talking about the Zombies that have taken over South Park!

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, Evil Knieval, why don't you jump over them with your rocket cycle?

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mayor and Officer Barbrady laugh even harder.

title: PINKEYE
text: Aw, to hell with you both!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef leaves, slamming the door behind him.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Mayor and Officer Barbrady laugh for a moment more, then
text: stop abruptly.

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, let's get back to it.

title: PINKEYE
text: Righteeo.

title: PINKEYE
role: The front door opens revealing an obese man.

title: PINKEYE
text: Trick or Treat!

title: PINKEYE
role: The man holds out some candy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hope you kids like chocolate peanut butter cream puffies --

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny JUMPS onto the man's back and SLASHES at his face.

title: PINKEYE
role: The man tries unsuccessfully to pull him off.

title: PINKEYE
text: AAGH! GET IT OFF!! GET IT OFF ME!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny rides the man as he spins around and COLLAPSES.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys look on with blank expressions.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kenny bites into the man's skull and digs into his brains.

title: PINKEYE
text: (pissed) Dammit! We'll never get any candy if Kenny keeps eating people!

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah! That's it, Kenny! You can't trick or treat with us anymore!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys leave Kenny eating the man's brains.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys walk down the street. Behind them, several zombies
text: tear down a house, we HEAR screaming coming from inside.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle rings the doorbell. The door opens to reveal a huge man
text: in a KKK robe. Behind him stand several other Klansmen.

title: PINKEYE
role: The Klansmen look down at Cartman in his KKK costume.

title: PINKEYE
text: Trick or Treat.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey... They're all dressed up like ghosts too!

title: PINKEYE
role: The Klansman throws something into Cartman's pumpkin pail
text: and slams the door.

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman pulls it out and looks at it.

title: PINKEYE
text: ONE Tootie bar?! You cheap bastards!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys stand at the front door of Chef's house. Stan rings
text: the doorbell.

title: PINKEYE
role: ANGLE ON: The boys, as the door opens.

title: PINKEYE
text: Trick or --

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys SCREAM as they see:

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef burst out at them, wielding two chainsaws.

title: PINKEYE
text: GET OFF MY PROPERTY YOU BRAIN EATIN' ZOMBIE BASTARDS!!

title: PINKEYE
text: AHHH! CHEF!! NO!!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef realizes that the boys look normal.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, sorry children, I thought you were one of them!

title: PINKEYE
text: Can we have candy now, please?

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef frowns when he sees Cartman.

title: PINKEYE
text: Dammit boy, what the hell are you doing dressed up like that?

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm TRYING to trick or treat God Dammit!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Remind me to whup your ass good next time I see you. Now get in here before those Zombies get you!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys sit on the couch while Chef talks to them.

title: PINKEYE
text: What are you talking about Chef?

title: PINKEYE
text: Zombies, children! South Park is overrun with THE LIVING DEAD! Haven't you noticed anything strange lately?

title: PINKEYE
text: Well, not really, except that Kenny keeps eating peoples' brains...

title: PINKEYE
text: Don't you children see? Kenny's turned into a zombie, along with everyone else in town!

title: PINKEYE
text: (realizing) Oh my God! That means...

title: PINKEYE
text: (also realizing) ...if everyone has been turned into Zombies...

title: PINKEYE
text: (having an epiphany) ...then there won't be anyone to give US CANDY!!!!!!!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: All the boys gasp at the same time.

title: PINKEYE
text: AAHHHH!

title: PINKEYE
text: Chef! You've got to help us!

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm working on it, children.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef throws a bunch of chainsaws and other assorted weapons
text: into a duffel bag.

title: PINKEYE
text: Wait, where are we going?

title: PINKEYE
text: The Doctor said the first people he treated were the Mortician and his Assistant. Now, I've got a hunch we'll get to the bottom of this at... THE MORGUE!

title: PINKEYE
role: The children sit on the couch frightened until Cartman farts.

title: PINKEYE
text: It was Kyle.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef, clutching the duffel bag, leads the children up the
text: path to the Mortuary.

title: PINKEYE
text: I don't know about this, Chef.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah. I'm scared.

title: PINKEYE
text: Remember candy. Focus on the candy.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef and the boys look around the room.

title: PINKEYE
text: What are we doing here, Chef?

title: PINKEYE
text: Just look for anything suspicious.

title: PINKEYE
text: I found it!! I found it!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle pulls out a porno magazine. Bold letters on the cover
text: read: "CRACK WHORE MAGAZINE". On the cover is Cartman's mom, posing in lingerie with a glass pipe in one hand and a butane torch in the other.

title: PINKEYE
text: What?

title: PINKEYE
text: See Cartman?! Your mom IS on the cover!

title: PINKEYE
text: We TOLD you, dude!!

title: PINKEYE
text: (grabbing magazine) You better let me take that, Kyle.

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey Chef, look!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef comes over to Stan, who stands by the embalming table.

title: PINKEYE
role: ANGLE ON: The plastic tubing. We FOLLOW it up onto the shelf,
text: past the row of bottles, up to the vat of embalming fluid, then up to the empty bottle of Worchestershire sauce.

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef grabs the empty bottle and reads the label. It says:

title: PINKEYE
role: "WARNING: NOT TO BE USED AS EMBALMING FLUID. EMERGENCY

title: PINKEYE
text: Uh oh... We gotta call this hotline number children!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then, a window CRASHES open!! It is ZOMBIE PIP!!

title: PINKEYE
text: PIIIINK EYYYEEE... PIIIINK EYYYEEE...

title: PINKEYE
text: It's the British kid!! He's a little limy zombie now!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Several other windows crash in. A horde of zombies is breaking
text: into the room!!

title: PINKEYE
text: AAAGH!!!

title: PINKEYE
text: LOOK OUT, CHILDREN!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: The zombies come at Stan and Kyle. Stan grabs a baseball bat
text: and smashes their heads in.

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay, Chef, dial the hotline number!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Chef?

title: PINKEYE
role: WHIP PAN around the room and STOP on Chef -- who looks just
text: like Michael Jackson in 'Thriller'.

title: PINKEYE
text: Chef!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Chef starts dancing and getting funky with the zombies.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Singing) I'm gonna make love, even when I'm dead. My body might get cold, but it's always hot in my bed! Make love, don't you be afraid. Just because my heart ain't beating don't mean you wont get laid.

title: PINKEYE
text: Let's get outta here!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Ooooohhhh!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys gulp nervously, look at each other, then SCREAM and
text: run away from the Zombies, who give chase.

title: PINKEYE
text: We gotta call that Worchestershire hotline!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey! There's a payphone!!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys stop at a little payphone. Stan hands Kyle the
text: bottle.

title: PINKEYE
text: You call the number, Kyle!

title: PINKEYE
text: But the zombies are coming!

title: PINKEYE
text: We'll hold 'em off!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan and Cartman grab their weapons and head towards the
text: zombies.

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle dials the number and An AUTOMATED VOICE comes on.

title: PINKEYE
text: (English accent) Welcome to the Worchestershire sauce customer service hotline! For Worchestershire sauce recipes please press 1 followed by the pound sign. For Worchestershire sauce product placement please press 2. If Worchestershire sauce has been used as embalming please press --

title: PINKEYE
text: Nobody screws up my Trick or Treats and gets away with it.

title: PINKEYE
role: An EPIC battles rages. Stan and Cartman stand together as
text: the Zombies come at them.

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman cuts off both arms and the head of a Zombie.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah cool!

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan cuts off the heads of two Zombies in one fell swoop.

title: PINKEYE
text: Sweet!

title: PINKEYE
role: We see a MONTAGE of Zombies getting beheaded from all
text: different angles. The chainsaws WHIR hellishly as Cartman and Stan are sprayed with purple blood and bits of gore.

title: PINKEYE
role: ANGLE ON: A photograph of three lovely ladies fondling each
text: other on a king-sized bed.

title: PINKEYE
role: Zombie Chef sits at the table, quietly flipping through the
text: porno mag.

title: PINKEYE
role: ANNOYING HOLD MUSIC plays. After a moment, a voice.

title: PINKEYE
text: (English accent) Worchestershire sauce emergency hotline, this call might be monitored to ensure you the highest quality service, how may I help you?

title: PINKEYE
text: There's a bunch a zombies here!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Please hold.

title: PINKEYE
role: The HOLD MUSIC starts up again.

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman slams his chainsaw into the gut of a Zombie and lifts
text: him up off the ground, the chainsaw WHIRRING.

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan finishes decapitating another Zombie, then turns to
text: see:

title: PINKEYE
text: Wendy?

title: PINKEYE
text: Finish her, dude! She's a Zombie now!

title: PINKEYE
text: I know, but... but

title: PINKEYE
text: Come on, Stan! Remember how she dissed you at the costume contest!

title: PINKEYE
text: Hey yeah...

title: PINKEYE
text: With the regular sauce, the first thing you need to do is make sure that you DO NOT just go out and start decapitating Zombies left and right, do you understand? DO NOT start decapitating Zombies left and right!

title: PINKEYE
role: Kyle looks out and sees Stan and Cartman killing Zombies
text: left and right.

title: PINKEYE
text: Uh... okay. Then what?

title: PINKEYE
role: Zombie Wendy continues to advance on Stan.

title: PINKEYE
text: Wendy! I know we had a fight, and I did wish that you were dead, but I didn't mean it!

title: PINKEYE
role: Zombie Wendy pauses for a moment, but then continues towards
text: Stan.

title: PINKEYE
text: Kill her, Stan!!

title: PINKEYE
text: All you have to do is kill the original Zombie, the one that started the whole mess. Once you kill the original Zombie all the other Zombies will turn back to normal.

title: PINKEYE
text: Original Zombie? Well, how the hell do we know who the original Zombie is?

title: PINKEYE
text: We realize you have a choice in Worchestershire sauces. We are delighted that...

title: PINKEYE
text: Wait a minute... That thing landed on Kenny... And they took HIM to the mortuary...

title: PINKEYE
text: I... I can't!

title: PINKEYE
role: Everyone stops and watches as Kyle runs up with his mule
text: chainsaw. He approaches Kenny and SLAMS the chainsaw down on top of his head.

title: PINKEYE
role: He pushes down until the chainsaw gets caught in Kenny's
text: neck. GRUNTING, Chef pushes harder, until the saw goes clear down to Kenny's feet, cutting him in half.

title: PINKEYE
role: Immediately Wendy turns back to normal and collapses into
text: Stan's arms.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh my god I killed Kenny! You bastard!!

title: PINKEYE
text: (groggy) Oh. What happened... Stan?

title: PINKEYE
text: Don't worry, babe. Everything's gonna be okay.

title: PINKEYE
text: It's working! They're turning back to normal!

title: PINKEYE
role: SFX: CHEESY MAGIC-WAND SOUND as the many Zombie corpses all
text: over the place lose their Zombie features and turn into regular corpses.

title: PINKEYE
text: You did it, children!

title: PINKEYE
text: Okay let's go trick or treating now come on!

title: PINKEYE
text: I'm sorry I dissed you at school like that, Stan. I guess I just wasn't very considerate of your feelings.

title: PINKEYE
text: That's okay, Wendy. I'm sorry I wished you were dead.

title: PINKEYE
role: They smile, gazing into each other's eyes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Maybe we could... Actually kiss tonight Stan...

title: PINKEYE
role: They lean forward and are about to kiss when Stan VOMITS on
text: Wendy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Eww! Gross Stan, Sick!! Barf is gross.

title: PINKEYE
role: Wendy steps through the rotting corpses to run away.

title: PINKEYE
role: Stan, Kyle and Cartman, in normal clothes, are standing in
text: front of a tombstone.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh, man... I can't believe he's gone...

title: PINKEYE
role: The small grave reads 'Kenny McCormick' and then 'Sleep well,
text: little child, the Lord holds thee now'.

title: PINKEYE
text: Yeah... He was too young to be taken from us!!

title: PINKEYE
text: Dude, you're the one who cut him in half with a chainsaw.

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman pulls out a small Kleenex and wipes his eyes.

title: PINKEYE
text: Let us remember the good times... Kenny would have wanted it that way.

title: PINKEYE
role: Cartman chokes himself up saying this. He really starts to
text: weep. Kyle puts his arm around him.

title: PINKEYE
role: All the boys appear to be sobbing. But then, suddenly, Cartman
text: pops out of it.

title: PINKEYE
text: You know I've really learned something today... Halloween isn't about costumes or candy... It's about being good to one another and giving and loving.

title: PINKEYE
text: No, dude, that's Christmas.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh... Then what's Halloween about?

title: PINKEYE
text: Costumes and candy.

title: PINKEYE
text: Oh.

title: PINKEYE
text: (Suddenly fine) Well, let's get home and start eating candy.

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys smile and start to walk away.

title: PINKEYE
text: We can eat it at Cartman's house and see more naughty pictures of his mom!

title: PINKEYE
text: Knock it off, you guys!! She said she was young and she needed the money!!

title: PINKEYE
text: (Off-screen) Cartman! The pictures were taken like last month!!

title: PINKEYE
text: (Off-screen) Screw you guys!!

title: PINKEYE
role: The boys fully exit frame, and we are left alone in the
text: graveyard.

title: PINKEYE
role: The camera TILTS DOWN to Kenny's grave...

title: PINKEYE
role: Suddenly a brown gloved hand BURSTS through the ground!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: As Horrific MUSIC plays, Kenny slowly pulls himself out of
text: his grave!!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Finally, the music reaches a CRESCENDO as Kenny stands above
text: his grave and gives out a muted cry!!

title: PINKEYE
role: Just then, a large statue from the grave next-door falls on
text: top of Kenny, killing him instantly.

title: PINKEYE
role: After a few seconds, a small plane crashes on top of that...
text: As if that were necessary.
